com.mobius.vdrapi
Interface IRemoteDocumentServer

public interface IRemoteDocumentServer

A class implements IRemoteDocumentServer to indicate that it has the properties of a remote document server.

Method Summary
 long getPortNumber()
          Returns the port number used for connecting to this remote server.
 String getRemoteDocumentServerName()
          Returns the name of the document server on the remote machine to connect to.
 String getRemoteHost()
          Returns the remote host name of the remote server.
 RemoteProtocol getRemoteProtocol()
          Returns the RemoteProtocol used by the remote server.
 void setPortNumber(long portNumber)
          Sets the port number used for connecting to this remote server.
 void setRemoteDocumentServerName(String serverName)
          Sets the name of the document server to use from the remote machine.
 void setRemoteHost(String hostName)
          Sets the remote host name of this remote server.
 void setRemoteProtocol(RemoteProtocol remoteProtocol)
          Sets the RemoteProtocol for this remote server.
